statements: SELECT * FROM match_results WHERE home_team = 'Barcelona';
SELECT match_date, home_team, away_team, home_score, away_score FROM match_results WHERE home_score > away_score;
SELECT match_date, home_team, away_team, home_score, away_score, home_goals, away_goals FROM match_results WHERE home_goals > away_goals;
SELECT match_date, home_team, away_team, home_assists, away_assists FROM match_results WHERE home_assists > away_assists;
SELECT match_date, home_team, home_score, home_goals, home_assists, home_cards FROM match_results WHERE home_cards > 1;
SELECT * FROM match_results ORDER BY match_date DESC, home_team ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT match_id, home_team, away_team, home_score, away_score FROM match_results WHERE home_score > away_score AND match_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY match_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT match_id, match_date, home_team, away_team, home_goals, away_goals, home_assists, away_assists FROM match_results WHERE home_goals > 3 OR away_goals > 3 ORDER BY match_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT match_id, match_date, home_team, away_team, home_assists, away_assists FROM match_results WHERE home_assists > 5 AND away_assists < 3 ORDER BY match_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT match_id, match_date, home_team, away_team, home_cards, away_cards FROM match_results WHERE home_cards > 0 OR away_cards > 0 ORDER BY match_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM Matches;
SELECT team1, team2, date FROM Matches WHERE score1 > score2;
SELECT player_name, goals_scored FROM Players WHERE red_cards > 1 ORDER BY goals_scored DESC;
SELECT team, SUM(goals_scored) AS total_goals FROM Players GROUP BY team ORDER BY total_goals DESC;
SELECT player_name, assists FROM Players WHERE assists IS NOT NULL AND yellow_cards < 2;
SELECT * FROM Matches WHERE team1='Barcelona' AND score1 > score2
SELECT team1, team2, date FROM Matches WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT team1, team2, goals1, goals2 FROM Matches WHERE score1 = score2 AND goals1 > 3
SELECT player_name, team, goals_scored FROM Players WHERE goals_scored > 10 ORDER BY goals_scored DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT team1, team2, assists1, assists2 FROM Matches WHERE assists1 IS NOT NULL OR assists2 IS NOT NULL ORDER BY team1
SELECT * FROM Teams
SELECT team_name, city, stadium_name FROM Teams WHERE established_year > 2000
SELECT manager_name, city FROM Teams WHERE city = 'London'
SELECT team_name, manager_name, city FROM Teams ORDER BY team_name DESC
SELECT team_name, established_year FROM Teams ORDER BY established_year ASC
SELECT * FROM MatchResults WHERE home_team = 'Manchester United'
SELECT match_date, match_time, home_team, away_team, home_team_goals, away_team_goals FROM MatchResults WHERE match_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT home_team, SUM(home_team_goals) AS total_home_goals FROM MatchResults GROUP BY home_team
SELECT team_name, city, stadium_name FROM Teams ORDER BY team_name DESC
SELECT player_name, goals_scored, assists FROM Players WHERE yellow_cards > 0 ORDER BY goals_scored DESC
SELECT * FROM match_results;
SELECT team1_id, team1_score, team1_goals, team1_assists FROM match_results;
SELECT team_id, team_name FROM teams;
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_position FROM players;
SELECT card_id, player_id, match_id, card_type FROM cards;
SELECT team_name FROM teams WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, player_position FROM players WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, team_name FROM players JOIN teams ON players.team_id = teams.team_id WHERE player_position = 'Forward';
SELECT match_id, team1_id, team2_id, team1_score, team2_score FROM match_results WHERE team1_score > team2_score;
SELECT player_name, card_type FROM players JOIN cards ON players.player_id = cards.player_id WHERE card_type = 'Red';
SELECT * FROM match_results;
SELECT match_id, match_date, home_team, away_team, home_score, away_score FROM match_results WHERE home_score > away_score;
SELECT team_name, founded_year, country FROM teams ORDER BY founded_year DESC;
SELECT player_name, position, date_of_birth FROM players WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, team_name FROM players JOIN teams ON players.team_id = teams.team_id;
SELECT * FROM match_results WHERE home_score > away_score ORDER BY match_date DESC, home_score ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT home_team, away_team, home_score, away_score FROM match_results WHERE match_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY home_score DESC, match_date ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT teams.team_name, players.player_name, players.position FROM teams INNER JOIN players ON teams.team_id = players.team_id WHERE teams.country = 'Spain' ORDER BY teams.team_name ASC, players.player_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT player_name, position, date_of_birth FROM players WHERE position = 'Forward' ORDER BY date_of_birth ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT team_name, founded_year, country FROM teams ORDER BY founded_year DESC, team_name ASC LIMIT 5;
